mapper.insert: insert into tenant_user_sys_res_role (code, name, type, memo, status, tenant_sid, sys_prj_sid, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{status}, #{tenantSid}, #{sysPrjSid}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{versionNum})

insert into tenant_user_sys_res_role (code, name, type, memo, status, tenant_sid, sys_prj_sid, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values
(#{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.type}, #{item.memo}, #{item.status}, #{item.tenantSid}, #{item.sysPrjSid}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.versionNum})
mapper.update:
update tenant_user_sys_res_role
version_num = version_num + 1,
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
memo = #{memo},
status = #{status},
tenant_sid = #{tenantSid},
sys_prj_sid = #{sysPrjSid},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where sid = #{sid} and version_num = #{versionNum}

update tenant_user_sys_res_role
version_num = version_num + 1,
type = #{type},
memo = #{memo},
status = #{status},
sys_prj_sid = #{sysPrjSid},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
and sid = #{sidCondition}
and sid in #{sid}
